New Playground At Campo Castelo Park

Location: Lugo, Spain
Date: 1/8/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Campo Castelo Park, nestled in the historic city of Lugo, Spain, has recently undergone a significant transformation. The renovation project breathed new life into the previously worn playground, turning it into an inviting and accessible space for both families and visitors to enjoy.Central to this refurbishment is the installation of a softfall surface made from blue Rosehill TPV®. This material is not only durable but also designed for safety, offering protection against injuries commonly associated with trips or falls. Its superior UV stability ensures that the vibrant colour and softness of the surface are maintained, even after prolonged exposure to harsh weather conditions.Rosehill TPV® is a versatile pour-in-place rubber, widely chosen for its practicality and visual appeal in community spaces and sports areas around the globe. Additionally, it is both safe and hypoallergenic, free from harmful substances, and meets the highest international standards for safety and environmental compliance.Thanks to <a href="https://valorizaecorubber.com/en/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">VALORIZA ECORUBBER</a>
